Text: Read more about the movie here: http://on-z.dk/vis.asp?id=9829174

Quality really isn't good... i think i'll wait until somebody releases better version ;)

Some screenshots:
http://xs308.xs.to/xs308/06453/zrzut1.png
http://xs308.xs.to/xs308/06453/zrzut2.png
http://xs308.xs.to/xs308/06453/zrzut3.png

The shitty quality gives it an almost home movie like feel that sort of adds to the whole thing. Unfortunately the guy who filmed it never bothered to center the camera so all the subtitled dialogue throughout the movie between Borat and his producer is cut off on the bottom of the screen.

It IS watchable but your better off looking for another version.
